data.text: Na lɔxɔni, Debora nun Baraka, Abinowan ma dii xɛmɛn yi bɛtin ba e bode xɔn, e naxa,
“Sofane yitɔnxi yɛngɛ so xinla ma Isirayila yi,
Ɛ tan mangane! Ɛ tan kuntigine,
Alatala, i to keli Seyiri yi,
Geyane yi xuruxurun Alatala yɛtagi,
Anataa dii xɛmɛn Samagara waxatini,
Taane bata yi rabeɲin Isirayila yi.
E bata yi ala gbɛtɛne sugandi.
“N bɔɲɛna Isirayila sofa kuntigine fɔxɔ ra,
Ɛ tan naxanye ɛ masiga tima sofali fixɛne fari,
ige maxanle xuiin na
E yi a fala, e naxa,
Nayi, naxanye lu e nii ra,
Efirami bɔnsɔnna muxuna ndee yi fa
Isakari kuntigine yi bira Debora fɔxɔ ra,
Nanfera i luxi sansanne kui
Galadi kaane yi lu Yurudɛn baan kidi ma!
Sabulon bɔnsɔnna muxune tan yi tin sayaan ma yɛngɛni,
“Mangane fa nɛn,
Sarene yi yɛngɛn so kore xɔnna ma,
Kison baa igen yi en yaxune xali,
Nayi, soone torone xuiin yi mini,
Alatalaa malekana nde yi a fala, a naxa,
Duban Yayeli xa dangu ɲaxanle birin na
Sisera bata igen maxɔdin,
A yi wudi ralemunxin suxu a kɔmɛnna ra,
A yi bira a san bun,
“Sisera nga yi a yɛɛn namini banxin foye soden na,
A kuntigi ɲaxalan xaxilimane yi a yabi ito ra
‘Sofane seene nan tongoxi yɛngɛni,
“Alatala, a yi lan nun,
